definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
sodium carbonate Na2CO3/soda ash/same as 碳酸鈉|碳酸钠
variant of 菸鹼|菸碱[yan1 jian3]/nicotine
choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the effects of piperine on sleep in mice and rabbits, and analyse anticonvulsant action of piperine in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究胡椒碱对动物睡眠的影响及其抗惊厥作用。

sentences.english: It is also a better Lewis base.
sentences.chinese: 氙也是较好的路易斯碱。

sentences.english: The different substituents on the aryl ketones determined the different base used in the reactions.
sentences.chinese: 芳基酮上的取代基决定了合成中所用碱的类型。

sentences.english: But some problems about the white bole efficient utilization have not been solved thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 但对碱回收的白泥有效利用问题没能彻底的解决。

sentences.english: HPLC method for the determination of stachydrine hydrochloride in Yimucao tablets was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了HPLC法测定益母草片中盐酸水苏碱的含量。

sentences.english: Evaluate the usage of radical scavengers in alkali burns of cornea.
sentences.chinese: 探讨角膜碱烧伤后自由基清除剂治疗机制。

sentences.english: The development direction and aim of mercury-free separator paper for battery were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了无汞碱锰电池隔离纸的发展方向和目标。

sentences.english: Hydroxides include the familiar alkalies of laboratory and industrial processes.
sentences.chinese: 氢氧化物包括实验室和工业过程中常用的碱。

sentences.english: Soluble metallic hydroxides are bases that are alkalies .
sentences.chinese: 可溶解的金属氢氧化合物都是碱。

sentences.english: If TOTM is neutralized & washed with alkaline alcohol solution, then its acid-value will be come down validly.
sentences.chinese: 采用碱的乙醇溶液可以有效降低产品酸值。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the toxicity effects of aconitine on neonatal rat cardiomyocytes.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究乌头碱对乳鼠心肌细胞的毒性作用。

sentences.english: HPLC method was established for the determination of gramine.
sentences.chinese: 建立测定芦竹碱的高效液相色谱法。

sentences.english: The findings would be helpful to guide the treatment of alkali burns.
sentences.chinese: 这一次发现有助于指导碱烧伤的治疗。

sentences.english: Pidan is prepared from raw duck egg by alkaline treatment.
sentences.chinese: 皮蛋是生鸭蛋经由碱处理而制成的。

sentences.english: Through use of transparent overlays solutions to acid and base equilibria can be obtained rapidly .
sentences.chinese: 使曲线明显重迭，可迅速得到酸和碱平衡的分解。

sentences.english: The results showed that pilocarpine was also an inhibitor of platelet aggregation.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现毛果芸香碱也是血小板聚集的抑制剂。
